backend/main.mo: Defines core types for restaurants, menu items, orders, and comparison helpers for sorting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling navigation, theme, authentication, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing restaurant contact info, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, cart count, auth controls, and admin link with mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LiveOrdersView.t: Admin-only live order monitor with polling, status updates, new‑order toasts, and cancellation workflow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form allowing users to enter and save basic profile fields using a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, restaurants, menu items, carts, and orders via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React, query client, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard enabling menu item management, order status updates, and restaurant data viewing with dialogs and UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, loads cart data, user profile, and menu items, and allows item removal and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays menu items with search, category filtering, and add-to-cart functionality, ensuring required items are included.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows a list of the user's past orders with status indicators and total price, sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/requiredMenuItems.ts: Ensures certain mandatory menu items are present by merging defaults with backend-fetched items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, clearing, and persisting URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, containers, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s schema version, high-level platform summary, and a list of implemented features covering authentication, actor creation, admin bootstrap, URL-secret handling, React Query hooks, and restaurant/menu/order functionality.
